content: उपमानं {@--1@} Comparison, resemblance; जातास्तदूर्वोरूपमानवाह्याः <ls>Ku. 1. 36.</ls> {@--2@} The standard of comparison, that with which anything is compared (<ab>opp.</ab> उपमेय); one of the four requisites of an उपमा; उपमानमभूद्विलासिनां <ls>Ku. 4. 5</ls>; उपमानस्यापि सखे प्रत्युपमानं वपुस्तस्याः <ls>V. 2. 3</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 49.</ls> {@--3@} (In Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab>) Analogy, recognition of likeness, considered as one of the four kinds of pramāṇas or means of arriving at correct knowledge. It is defined as प्रसिद्धसाधर्म्यात् साध्यसाधनं; or उपमितिकरणमुपमानं तच्च सादृश्यज्ञानात्मकं <ls>Tarka K.</ls> {@--4@} A particle of comparison.
